DOC.brief_title: Dose Ranging Efficacy And Safety With Mepolizumab Severe Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate efficacy , safety pharmacodynamics three dos ( 75 mg , 250 mg 750 mg ) mepolizumab intravenous ( i.v . ) administer every 4 week compare placebo 52-week treatment period subject severe uncontrolled refractory asthma . Efficacy measure frequency asthma exacerbation . In addition lung function , rescue medication usage , daily symptom , asthma control score , asthma quality life score withdrawal due asthma exacerbation assess . Safety assess adverse event , clinical laboratory evaluation , ECGs , immunogenicity vital sign . Pharmacodynamics assess eosinophil level blood , serum IL-5 eosinophil level induce sputum .
